entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Prince George
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:48 AM PST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING ENDED, Prince George

entry.title: Current Conditions: Sunny, -25.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Prince George Airport 10:00 AM PST Friday 24 February 2023
Condition: Sunny
Temperature: -25.0°C
Pressure: 102.9 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 77 %
Wind Chill: -32
Dewpoint: -27.9°C
Wind: S 8 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Friday: A few flurries. High minus 16.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. A few flurries beginning this afternoon. Wind becoming south 20 km/h early this afternoon. High minus 16. Wind chill near minus 28. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 16.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning late this evening. Amount 5 cm. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Temperature steady near minus 16. Wind chill minus 27 this evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow at times heavy. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Amount 15 cm. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 21 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Friday 24 February 2023
